For optimized battery life, your phone should never go below 20% or never above 85%.

It may put your mind at ease when your smartphone’s battery reads 100% charge, but it’s actually not ideal for the battery.

So, if you are keen on keeping your battery living as long as possible, you should keep its charge between 20 and 85%.

This is exactly what SafeCharge serves, it plays an alert tone right when your phone has just reached optimal charge level, alerting you to disconnect the charger.

Your phone should ideally stay within the 20% to 85% charge range.

While seeing 100% charge feels good, it's not the best for your battery

To prolong your battery's life, consider using SafeCharge.

It notifies you when your phone crosses the 85% threshold, reminding you to unplug your charger for optimal battery care.
